name: Nullifier
description: A dangerous weapon pilfered from an inverse dimension.

abilities.name: Nullify
abilities.description: Launches a projectile at the target enemy, that applies a debuff on the which continuously dispels them and slows their movement speed.
notes: Applies a basic dispel upon projectile impact, before applying the modifier
The modifier applies a basic dispel in 0.2-second intervals, 0.2 seconds after the debuff is applied, resulting in 20 dispel instances
Can be cast on Invulnerable units
However, the debuff is not applied on invulnerable targets
Does not pierce Debuff Immunity sources
This ability is nullified by Spell Block sources
This ability is reflected by Spell Reflection sources
The debuff is only dispellable by Death

additionalInfo: This item is shown as a Team Item in the shop window when purchased by an ally
